cash.name: Cash
cash.description: Money. Used for buying most stuff.

offshore.name: Offshore Cash
offshore.description: Money, stored in your bank account. Used for Offshore Payday and buying contracts.

continental_coins.name: Continental Coins
continental_coins.description: Alternative currency, used for buying expensive stuff.

crimespree.name: Crime Spree
crimespree.description: A chain of heists, used for farming continental coins.

crimespree_record.name: Crime Spree Record
crimespree_record.description: The record for a user's highest crime spree level.

join.name: Join Time
join.description: The time when a criminal joins CRIME.NET.

char.name: Character
char.description: The criminal's identity. (Or what player they choose to play as.)

weapon.name: Signature Weapon
weapon.description: The signature weapon of a user.

daily.name: Daily Reward Timestamp
daily.description: Timestamp for daily reward for logging onto CRIME.NET.

exp.name: Experience
exp.description: Amount of experience a criminal has.

reputation.name: Reputation Level
reputation.description: The level of reputation a criminal has.

infamy.name: Infamy
infamy.description: The infamy level of a criminal.

dallas.name: Dallas
dallas.fbi:
If this one isn't actually the leader, he's definitely the trusted lieutenant. Dallas is one of the original four that emerged in 2011. He appears to be the Mastermind of the gang, and his calm demeanor under fire suggests both great experience and cunning intelligence.

Security footage notes his hair is greying, possibly indicating he is one of the oldest members of the gang.

His smiling clown mask with the American pattern has become the face for the Payday gang.
quotes: AAAAAHHHH! I need a medic bag!

chains.name: Chains
chains.fbi:
We regard this one as the Enforcer in the gang. He tends to bring the biggest gun and a lot of ammo to feed it. Breaking down his movement, style and technique, it is obvious that "Chains" is ex-military. It is likely he was special forces, and, based on overheard conversation, possibly even a former Navy SEAL. "Chains" appears to have a daredevil personality, and a strong conviction that he cannot be hurt or killed.

Recently, we know that "Chains" was taking refuge in a Swedish safehouse. It was believed that he had been killed when Swedish police raided the safehouse, but "Chains" has since resurfaced in Washington.
quotes: Don't you be tricky now! Chains hates tricky.

wolf.name: Wolf
wolf.fbi:
For his affinity for explosives and capability with hardware, we consider this one to be the Technician in the group. Further study by our profiling teams in Behavioral Analysis suggest that "Wolf" could be psychotic, as evidenced by his sudden shifts of mood.

From the few corroborated accounts we have, "Wolf" does not appear to be a US national. His voice carries a distinct Scandinavian accent, suggesting he is Norwegian or Swedish.
quotes: It's a fucking medic! (Also says this line faster.)

It's a motherfucking medic!
(note: Wolf pronounces 'medic' as 'medi'.)

w_amcar.name: AMCAR
w_amcar.description: Fully automatic 5.56mm. Decent accuracy and damage.

w_ak.name: AK Rifle
w_ak.description: 30-round assault rifle. Decent rate of fire and accuracy.

w_car4.name: CAR-4
w_car4.description: 30-round assault rifle. Good handling and accuracy. Very versatile overall.

w_uar.name: UAR Rifle
w_uar.description: 30-round bullpup assault rifle. Good stopping power and accuracy.

w_jp36.name: JP36
w_jp36.description: Assault rifle with medium damage and high ammo capacity.

w_galant.name: Galant
w_galant.description: The infamous rifle from World War II. 8-round clip feed system, semi-automatic. Deadly. But who thought it was a good idea to ace Surefire and make it a 23-round weapon?

w_m308.name: M308
w_m308.description: Sharpshooter rifle. High powered, but with high recoil.

w_ak5.name: AK5
w_ak5.description: 30-round assault rifle with decent capacity and low recoil.

w_amr16.name: AMR-16
w_amr16.description: 30-round assault rifle with high lethality and rate of fire. Watch out for its ammo, however.

w_tempest21.name: Tempest-21
w_tempest21.description: 30-round bullpup assault rifle with high concealment and stability.

w_union556.name: Union 5.56
w_union556.description: The Union 5.56 Rifle is a highly versatile assault rifle. Commonly used within the military, this bullpup beauty is perfect for long range, as well as CQC situations. Easy to modify and overall a weapon fit for every type of heist.

w_commando553.name: Commando 553
w_commando553.description: A thoroughly modern 5.56mm assault rifle, made in Europe. Short, lightweight and reliable, the perfect trade-off between power, range and handling. Comes with custom stocks, grips, foregrips, barrels and body.

w_eagleheavy.name: Eagle Heavy
w_eagleheavy.description: 7.62x51mm, gas-operated, rotating bolt. Comes in two flavors: light and heavy; This is the heavy one. Works like a charm in extreme environments - having carried this in action, it's a personal favorite of mine.

w_chimano88.name: Chimano 88
w_chimano88.description: Semi-automatic 9mm. Decent accuracy, decent capacity, decent damage.

w_crosskill.name: Crosskill
w_crosskill.description: Semi-automatic .45ACP. Medium stopping but low capacity.

devonly_ketchdev.name: KETCHNOV Byk-1, Developer Version
devonly_ketchdev.description: Developer version of the KETCHNOV Byk-1 Assault Rifle. Own this item? Damn impressive.
